attributes.action: Allow taxes paid to be reclaimed and refunded within 3 years in the case of "boom" and "bust"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Some people work in industries or are self-employed whereby they may earn a huge amount in one year and then either be made redundant or make losses or very little in a subsequent year.

At present, companies may reclaim corporation taxes they have paid in the previous 3 years to offset losses in subsequent years, but an individual who pays a lot of high-rate tax in one year cannot subsequently offset this in a later year on their own tax return.

I think this should be corrected.
